name: Path Caster
description:
Spend your limited mana to reshape the level and make a safe path to the exit. Avoid the enemies that block your way. Can you get through all 30 levels?

Controls
  • Move with the arrow keys or WASD.
  • Use magic by pressing X and then selecting a direction (requires mana).
  • Skip a turn by pressing X twice (or just once if you have no mana).
  • Press Z to undo turns.
  • Press R to restart the level.
